findings.title: State variables that could be declared constant
findings.description: Add the `constant` attributes to state variables that never change

findings.title: Write better descriptive error messages
findings.description: Error messages can be improved to provide more descriptive information, such as 'Taxes exceed maximums' instead of 'Cannot exceed maximums.' and 'Cannot set max wallet sell percentage below 10%' instead of 'Cannot set below 10%'
